ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-B IMPACT/MAG Magnetic Field Vectors and Ancillary Data
ResourceHeader.Description:
This data product contains Level 1 0.125-s values of solar 
wind magnetic field data taken by the IMPACT/Magnetometer on STEREO-B.  The interface 
at UCB provides access to CDF-formatted files of magnetic field data in RTN
coordinates.  The interface at UCLA allows selection of STEREO A or STEREO B 
data and of vector quantities in RTN or spacecraft coordinates.  It also allows 
selection of either of two parameter sets: [Bx, By, Bz, |B|] or [RBx, RBy, RBz, |B|, 
cone and clock angles].  Further, this interface enables easy migration between 
plot vs. ASCII data presentation options and among the three available resolutions 
(1, 8, 32 Hz).  The parameter level information given below is specific to the 
CDF version of the data at UCB.

InformationURL.Name: STEREO IMPACT Mission Site

The web site provides detailed descriptions of the STEREO 
IMPACT MAG instrument as well as associated data sets.

AccessURL.Name: Download of STEREO-B IMPACT/MAG Level 1 data
AccessURL.Description: A web site hosting the STEREO-B IMPACT/MAG Level 1 data

NumericalData.Caveats:
Current version of the data include very fast (subsecond) 
glitches in the magnetometer's X sensor. Magnitude of these glitches are 
approximately 0.5 nT and occur at varying frequencies throughout the 
mission.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Vector in RTN Coordinates
Parameter.Description:
Magnetic field vectors as measured by the IMPACT/MAG 
instrument in RTN coordinate system.

Parameter.Name: MAG Flag
Parameter.Description:
Error Flag -      
        bit 0:3 Mag Error counter
        bit 4:7 Mag Command counter
        bit 8   spare
        bit 9   First
        bit 10  Time
        bit 11  Interface Parity Error (0=OK, 1=Fault)
        bit 12  Interface Timeout Error (0=OK, 1=Fault)
        bit 13  ADC Cal (0=OFF, 1=ON)
        bit 14  In Flight Cal (0=OFF, 1=ON)
        bit 15  Range (0=low fields, high sensitivity, 1=high fields, low sen
        bit 16  Calibration (0=old cal, 1=new cal)
        bit 17  STEREO STEPPING For X-axis
        bit 18:31 spare
